subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Rochelle Sterling, wife of the beleaguered Donald Sterling, said she would fight to maintain ownership of the franchise, saying, “If the roles were reversed, would they take the team away from the man?”
snippet: Rochelle Sterling, wife of the beleaguered Donald Sterling, said she would fight to maintain ownership of the franchise, saying, “If the roles were reversed, would they take the team away from the man?”
